column1: Úrimë (Urui in Sindarin) was the eighth month of the year in the Kings Reckoning and the Stewards Reckoning of Gondor
column3: and preceding Yavannië. In the New Reckoning it was the fifth month of the year.

column1: Úrimë in the Kings Reckoning (and for the most part in the Stewards Reckoning) corresponded to Wedmath in the Shire Calendar (approximately modern 24 July through 22 August).
